header: Yearn For His Word So That You May Grow

verse: Having then laid-aside all badness, and all deceit and hypocrisies and jealousies, and all slanders—
yearn like newborn babies for the deceitless milk of-the-Word in order that by it you may grow in [your] salvation,
if  you tasted that the Lord is good—

header: For You Are Being Built Upon The Living Cornerstone As a Holy Priesthood

verse: ... coming to Whom as the living Stone having been rejected by people, but chosen, precious with God,
you yourselves also as living stones are being built as a spiritual house for a holy priesthood, to offer spiritual sacrifices acceptable to God through Jesus Christ.
Because it is contained in Scripture: “Behold, I am laying a Stone in Zion— a chosen, precious Cornerstone. And the one putting-faith upon Him will never be put-to-shame” [Isa 28:16].
The precious-value then is for you, the ones believing. But for ones not-believing: “The Stone which the ones building rejected, this became the head of the corner” [Ps 118:22]
and “a Stone of stumbling and a Rock of  falling” [Isa 8:14]— who stumble while disobeying the word, to which indeed they were appointed.

header: And You Are Chosen By God To Report His Virtues To The World

verse: And you are a chosen family, a royal priesthood, a holy nation, a people for His possession, so that you may report the virtues of the One having called you out of darkness into His marvelous light—
who once were not a people, but now are the people of God; the ones not having received-mercy, but now having received-mercy.

header: Beloved, Keep Your Conduct Praiseworthy In The World So That God May Be Glorified

verse: Beloved, I exhort you as foreigners and pilgrims to be abstaining from fleshly desires which wage-war against the soul,
holding your conduct good among the Gentiles in order that in what they are speaking-against you as evil-doers, they may by observing your good works glorify God on the day of visitation.

header: Be Subject To Human Institutions For The Lord’s Sake

verse: Be subject to every human institution for the Lord’s sake— whether to a king as being superior,
or to governors as being sent by him for the punishment of evil-doers and praise of good-doers.
Because thus is the will of God, that while doing-good you may be silencing the ignorance of foolish people.
As free ones, and not having the freedom as a covering of evilness, but as slaves of God,
honor everyone: be loving the brotherhood, be fearing God, be honoring the king;

header: Be Subject To Your Masters, Whether Good Or Bad, Following Christ’s Example

verse: ... servants, being subject to your masters with all fear, not only to the good and kind ones, but also to the crooked ones.
For this finds favor— if for the sake of a consciousness of God one bears-up while suffering sorrows unjustly.
For what-kind-of credit is it if while sinning and being beaten, you will endure? But if while doing-good and suffering you will endure, this finds favor with God.
For you were called to this. Because Christ also suffered for you, leaving-behind a pattern for you in order that you might follow-after His footsteps—

header: Christ Suffered Unjustly, Entrusting Himself To God

verse: ... Who “did not commit sin, nor was deceit found in His mouth” [Isa 53:9];
Who while being reviled, was not reviling-in-return; while suffering, was not threatening, but was committing Himself  to the One judging righteously;
Who Himself bore our sins in His body on the cross in order that we, having died to sins, might live for righteousness; by Whose bruise you were healed.
For you were going-astray like sheep, but now you returned to the Shepherd and Overseer of your souls.
